title: When the enemy team counters you perfectly

replies.body:
Nevermind, found it. And I have to say, I wasn't expecting the ending. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2vICmOcjtI
omfg, what is this and how do i unsee this
Why would u want to unsee this greatness
So I can see it again in its greatness!
I don't know how i feel about this

...it means that you play Rengar! 

Literally countered by 70% of all champs.

Ftfy{{item:3070}}

….it means that you play ~~Rengar~~ ~~Karthus~~ Yorick!

Literally countered by ~~70%~~~~ 90%~~ 0% of all champs.

Just imagine... the All For One: Mirror Match. 5 Yorick vs 5 Yorick.
Nobody wins lane.
At some point you just hope one of the enemy team gets annoyed enough to disconnect.
It becomes a minigame in which each Yorick has to stack 6 Tear of the Goddess. Whoever's team has all of their Yorick's with 6 fully stacked tears wins.
{{champion:16}} no one dies ever
omg yes they do burst or just {{summoner:14}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3033}} arrr die bitch as ho raka
this is epik
A hindu epic
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Oh my god, I never thought I'd actually see one of these used as memes.

For those who don't know, just like how there are movies about Jesus, Hindus have series based on various events told in our religion. They usually come in two flavours, comedic animated shorts or very low budget reenactments, the story telling and acting is still good though.

Can't quite tell what event this is though, it looks like the Ramayana but I'm not sure.
Battle between Bhima and Karna, if my abrupt research is any indication.
What is this???
It almost looks like a Montey Python thing.
It is a reenactment of a hindu epic Ramayana, it is a story about some guy stealing another guys wife who is actually an avatar (Reincarnation) of the god vishnu. This is a fight between them.

They counter you just right

http://66.media.tumblr.com/29464df31302aadb40e0db8933b69253/tumblr_o5dqxowJGu1qkv9q4o1_500.jpg

lol
but these guys got your back so you good  {{champion:16}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:32}}
I too like memes
This reminds me of the 'Butter Battle Book' by Dr. Suess...
Saved for future random need.
It's literally Ashe players showing off their Volleys, Q Passives, and Ultimates.....at once. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
I think I saw this scene in Fear and Loathing.
Anyone else think the guy in white looks like a really young Rowan Atkinson?

Having a hard time finding the source of OP's gif, though. :/

All I know is that he dragged it straight from reddit.
You sir, get my upvote.
